item.title: About
item.description: Hello :) My name is Yash. I like spreading knowledge of Cloud Native technologies for the greater good! You will see me around there trying to learn new stuffs always, and writing some experiences here. If you want to reach out and provide me some feedback, or ask something from anything I wrote here please please please! Feel free to direct message me. My twitter and Linkedin are here. Hope you enjoy the content here :)

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
